app_title: Steam Achievement Localizer by Pan_Vena ver
tooltip_restart_steam: Close and restart the Steam client
msg_restart_steam: Do you want to restart Steam to apply changes?
warning_message:
Possible bugs, for questions please refer to the GitHub page, or write in private on Telegram: @Pan_Vena, Discord: pan_vena
or just E-mail: pan.vena@ukr.net
Other my contact details can be found in 'About App'
steam_folder_label: Select path to Steam folder (For example: C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam)
game_id_label: Enter game ID or Steam store link (For example: https://store.steampowered.com/app/257510/The_Talos_Principle/)
fetch_missing_names: Fetch Missing Names from Steam API
fetch_missing_names_hint: Click to fetch game names from Steam API for all games showing 'UNKNOWN'. This requires internet connection.
save_bin_unknown: Save bin file to Steam folder
export_bin: Open current bin file in Explorer
save_changes_msg: Do you want to save your changes?
save_where_msg: Where do you want to save your changes?
about_message:
The app is made for translating Steam achievements names.

In case of questions:
- Telegram: @Pan_Vena
- Discord: pan_vena
- GitHub: PanVena
- E-mail: pan.vena@ukr.net

Also thanks for pull requests: Vadko, Zergatul, Nick Defrunct, veydzh3r, ♡Cutie Patootie♡ and MrIkso
records_loaded: {count} records loaded: {countby2} achievements and their descriptions.
error_no_id:
Enter game ID or link to it,
which you know from the top of the Steam store page
export_csv_for_translate_info:
Export to CSV for translation includes columns: key, english, translation and selected context language.
After translation, fill in the 'translation' column and import the file back into the program and select 'english' as language to replace.
error_no_english:
Missing 'english' column.
That means the file is not loaded.
import_csv_info:
Importing CSV will replace the selected language with values from the 'translation' column if it is filled in.
Select 'english' or any other language as language for replace before importing.
import_no_changes: CSV imported, but no data was changed
save_no_game_id: Cannot save to Steam: Game ID is not specified. Please enter a Game ID or select a game from the list.
error_no_end_was_found: Cannot find the end of the line.
error_nothing_after_english: Could not find end of string after 'english'.
error_manually_selected_file: You have loaded the file from some other folder, go save it somewhere else
in_steam_folder_saved: File saved in Steam folder. Restart Steam to see changes.
file_saved:
File saved successfully in:
{save_path}

Don't forget to restart Steam when you`ll put this file back to Steam folder.
You can find the paths where to put them:
C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\appcache\stats (for Windows)
~/.steam/steam/appcache/stats (for Linux)
folder_not_found_auto: Could not find Steam folder automatically
gamename_list: Game name or its code name
delete_stats_file_confirm:
Are you sure you want to delete this bin file?
{path}
Do you want to save a CSV backup and then delete it?
delete_stats_file: Delete bin file(if there is a problem)
delete_stats_file_done: Bin file with {gamename} achievements names deleted.
help_tooltips_desc: Description of all tooltips you can see in the application.
tooltip_replace_in_column: Search and replace text in columns
tooltip_fetch_missing_names: Scan all achievement files and fetch missing game names from Steam API (requires internet connection)
api_block_warning_message: Steam API seems to be blocking requests (Too Many Requests). Loading game names has been paused to avoid further blocking. You can try again later.
tooltip_update_steam_app_list: Download the full list of Steam games for faster offline lookup
tooltip_open_in_steam_store: Open the game's Steam Store page in browser
tooltip_open_in_file_manager: Open the achievements file folder in file manager
tooltip_check_for_updates: Check if a new version is available
update_restart_message: The application will now restart to complete the update.
update_no_download: No download available for your platform.
update_up_to_date: You are using the latest version.
fetch_rate_limited: ⚠️ Rate limited by Steam after {count} requests. Try again later for remaining games.
fetch_error_count: {count} games could not be fetched (likely removed from Steam).
